snippet: With almost every Bollywood leading man flaunting beefcake on-screen, fitness centers, once almost nonexistent in India, have quickly multiplied.
abstract: Bollywood's male stars in India are showing off their toned abdominal muscles, a relatively new trend that has become a marker up upward mobility; personal trainers to the stars have become minor celebrities in Mumbai, featured in movie magazines, and fitness centers are filled with aspiring actors and actresses who zealously measure body fat and muscle mass.
lead_paragraph: With almost every Bollywood leading man flaunting beefcake on-screen, fitness centers, once almost nonexistent in India, have quickly multiplied.

headline.seo: On-Screen Abdominals Send India’s Men to Gym
headline.main: A Quest for Six-Packs, Inspired by Bollywood
headline.print_headline: A Quest for Six-Packs, Inspired by Bollywood
